channel.title: Looking for some coordinates!
channel.description:
hey i need some coordinates for my pk teleport, please comment below if you know one of the following:
Ghorrock teleport East dragons Hill giants(wildy)
thanks

item.title: Looking for some coordinates!
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

Damn I wish I could give you my coordinate grabber, but I’m not home.
Sorry
Try the way the guy above me said.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some coordinates!
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“sertan8, post:1, topic:528392”]hey i need some coordinates for my pk teleport, please comment below if you know one of the following:

Ghorrock teleport
East dragons
Hill giants(wildy)

thanks[/quote]
use a ::tele xxxx yyyy to get you as close as possible
Then walk to them, log out, then check the char save for the coordinates? even if you dont have a ::mypos(server) or ::debug(client) command you can still figure it out the old fashioned way I figured reason you are asking is because you don’t have one of these options. so the char save is always a good backup method (:

Read full topic
